document.heading: DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA PUBLIC SCHOOL NURSE ASSIGNMENT ACT OF 1987 AMENDMENT ACT OF 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-149 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-511, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 1, 1990, and May 15, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 30, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-207 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
